downloadTitle: Certification Test Tool for Windows Server 2019
downloadDescription: Use this test tool to validate application compatibility and certify your application for Windows Server 2019

downloadFile.name: Certification Test Tool 1.0 for Windows Server.msi

detailsSection:
The Certification Test Tool for Windows Server 2019 is designed to help test your applications for compatibility and validate implementation of best practices for the Windows Server 2019 platform. 
This tool is also recommended for Customers to evaluate third party applications and for testing Line of Business applications.
detailsSection_file_name: Certification Test Tool 1.0 for Windows Server.msi
installInstructionSection:
Download and extract the test tool package. Navigate to the specified folder, launch the and follow directions of the wizard style tool.

The Test Tool supports validation of the following Windows Server 2019 configuration options: 

- Windows Server in the Desktop Experience (full installation) configuration.  This option requires to install and run your application locally on the machine where the test tool is installed and running Windows Server in the Desktop Experience (full installation) configuration.
